text: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati
edit: Yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhave bhikkhuno passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu bhāveti samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati

translations.transtext: In which occasion, monks, when the body calmed down, [and the monk is] happy, the monk's mind gets concentrated, in that occasion concentration-factor of enlightenment gets started. In that occasion, the monk cultivates the concentration-factor of the enlightenment. In that occasion, the monk's concentration-factor of the enlightenment becomes fully developed.
